patterns: may i know what are the stalls available?
responses: The available stores opened are Malay, Mamak, Beverage, Japanese, and Korean
We open from 9am to 9pm

patterns: What food does malay stall sells?
responses: Malay stall sells nasi lemak, a variety of nasi goreng, ikan goreng, ayam goreng, satay, and kuih.

patterns: What food does mamak stall sells?
responses: Mamak stall serves a variety of roti, mee goreng, maggi goreng, teh tarik, cincau ais, milo ais, limau drink and more.

patterns: What drinks does beverage stall sells?
responses: Beverage stall serves a variety of juices, brewed coffee, American coffee, Hot mocha/Iced mocha

patterns: What food does korean stall sells?
responses: Korean stall serves kimchi/gimbap, kimchi fried rice, ramyun, japchae, bibimbap
Korean stall serves bulgogi rice, jjajangmyeon and tteok too

patterns: What food does japanese stall sells?
responses: Japanese stall serves chawanmushi, gyoza, tempura, egg roll
Japanese stall serves a variety of bento
Japanese stall has several set lunch and set dinner with comes with miso soup and chawanmushi

i'd like to get my food delivered

i would like to have it delivered
responses: Most of the item on the food comes with free delivery while some food does not provide delivery.
